lead_paragraph: An investigation into the state agency that regulates boxing — and, soon, mixed martial arts — found that it was short on proper practices and procedures but long on conflicts of interest.

headline.print_headline: Investigation Faults  New York Agency Regulating Boxing
headline.main: Inquiry Finds Widespread Disorder at New York Athletic Commission

snippet: An investigation into the state agency that regulates boxing — and, soon, mixed martial arts — found that it was short on proper practices and procedures but long on conflicts of interest....
abstract: New York Office of Inspector General investigative report on State Athletic Commission finds that agency is rife with conflicts of interests and other improprieties; agency, which regulates boxing and will soon regulate mixed martial arts, is reported to be mess organizationally speaking; chairman Thomas Hoover is accused of letting friends and relatives gain free access to high-profile matches.
